qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq "/setvar key=lolicoins 1 \| /send <style>@keyframes bg-animate{0%{background-position: 0% 0%;} 25%{background-position: 100% 0%;} 50%{background-position: 100% 100%;} 75%{background-position: 0% 100%;}} @keyframes initial-render-shrink {0%{opacity: 0%; transform: scale(3, 3);} 100%{opacity: 100%; transform: scale(1, 1);}} @keyframes initial-render-grow{0%{opacity: 0%; transform: scale(.1, .1);} 100%{opacity: 100%; transform: scale(1, 1);}} @keyframes rank-anim{0%{transform: rotate(-15deg);} 25%{opacity: 100%; transform: rotate(-25deg);} 50%{transform: rotate(-15deg);} 75%{transform: rotate(-5deg);} 100%{transform: rotate(-15deg);}} .desc{font-size: 10px; text-shadow: -1px -1px 0 #372f2f, 1px -1px 0 #372f2f, -1px 1px 0 #372f2f, 1px 1px 0 #372f2f; font-weight: bolder} .emoji{font-size: 50px; position: absolute; animation: initial-render-shrink 1s linear 3.5s both, rank-anim 1s linear infinite 3.5s}</style> \| /hide 1"

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/if left=userinput right=pull rule=eq "/run gachalolis.pullcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=render rule=eq "/run gachalolis.renderhtml" |
/if left=userinput right=get rule=eq "/run gachalolis.getcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=renderblank rule=eq "/run gachalolis.renderhtmlblank"

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run gachalolis.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else="/send {{input}}{{newline}}{{pipe}} \| /trigger" "/setvar key=blocktrigger false" | /flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: renderhtml
qrList.message:
/setvar key=blocktrigger true | /run gachalolis.getvals | /if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/echo Loli info incomplete. \| /abort" | /findentry file="Gacha Lolis" {{getvar::name}} | /setvar key=uid | /if left=uid right=0 rule=gte else="/run gachalolis.addtolorebook" "/echo Loli name already exists in lorebook." | /sd {{getvar::image}} | /setvar key=timestamp {{datetimeformat YYYY-MM-DD@hh?mm?ss?}} | /setvar key=regex \? | /setvar key=regexflags i | /setvar key=toreplace h | /regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::timestamp}} | /setvar key=timestamp | /setvar key=toreplace m | /regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::timestamp}} | /setvar key=timestamp | /setvar key=toreplace s | /regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::timestamp}} | /setvar key=timestamp | /lg | /fuzzy list={{pipe}} {{getvar::timestamp}} | /setvar key=imagelink | /setvar key=html

Rank {{getvar::rank}}

{{getvar::emoji1}}

{{getvar::emoji2}}

{{getvar::emoji3}}

{{getvar::name}}

{{getvar::description}}

Value: {{getvar::value}}

{{getvar::flavortext}}

| /send | /setvar key=htmlready false | /hide {{lastMessageId}} | /echo HTML rendered. Be sure to update her lorebook key. | /flushvar jbout

qrList.label: getvals
qrList.message:
/setvar key=htmlready true |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |

/setvar key=startregex Name\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \nDescription\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=name |
/setvar key=varname name | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Rank\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \nName\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=rank |
/setvar key=varname rank | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Description\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \nValue\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=description |
/setvar key=varname description | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Value\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \nFlavor text\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=value |
/setvar key=varname value | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Flavor text\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \nImage\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=flavortext |
/setvar key=varname flavortext | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Image\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n1\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=image |
/setvar key=varname image | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |
/setvar key=image loli, cute, petite, flat, one girl, {{getvar::image}} |

/setvar key=startregex 1\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji1 |
/setvar key=varname emoji1 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex 2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji2 |
/setvar key=varname emoji2 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex 3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n(?<=3\s?[:\-\.][\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji3 |
/setvar key=varname emoji3 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=color1 #fff | /setvar key=color2 #fff | /setvar key=color3 #fff |
/if left=rank right=SSS rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #d713ec \| /setvar key=color2 #ffe072 \| /setvar key=color3 #ec1346" |
/if left=rank right=SS rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #ff3333 \| /setvar key=color2 #fffabe \| /setvar key=color3 #ff3333" |
/if left=rank right=S rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #ae821e \| /setvar key=color2 #fcf0f0 \| /setvar key=color3 #ae821e" |
/if left=rank right=A rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #b6008b \| /setvar key=color2 #e6b4ff \| /setvar key=color3 #b6008b" |
/if left=rank right=B rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #059fbf \| /setvar key=color2 #c3ffd3 \| /setvar key=color3 #059fbf" |
/if left=rank right=C rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #06430a \| /setvar key=color2 #34c73d \| /setvar key=color3 #06430a" |
/if left=rank right=D rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #1d1d1d \| /setvar key=color2 #717171 \| /setvar key=color3 #1d1d1d" |
/if left=rank right=F rule=eq "/setvar key=color1 #442900 \| /setvar key=color2 #e09c35 \| /setvar key=color3 #442900"

qrList.label: pullcommand
qrList.message:
/flushvar jbout |
/setvar key=blocktrigger true |
/if left=lolicoins right=0 rule=lte "/echo You don't have any LoliCoins left. \| /abort" |
/setvar key=rand {{random: F,F,F,F,D,D,D,D,D,D,C,C,C,C,C,C,B,B,B,B,B,B,B,B,B,B,A,A,A,A,S,SS,SSS}} |
/if left=rand right=F rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A profoundly retarded or disabled loli." |
/if left=rand right=D rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A bad-taste loli." |
/if left=rand right=C rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A loli with a twist." |
/if left=rand right=B rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc An ordinary cute loli." |
/if left=rand right=A rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A magical or high tech loli." |
/if left=rand right=S rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A mythical loli." |
/if left=rand right=SS rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A loli deity." |
/if left=rand right=SSS rule=eq "/setvar key=rankdesc A cosmic entity loli." |
/setvar key=jbout {{user}} pulled the lever. The rank he gets is Rank {{getvar::rand}}: {{getvar::rankdesc}} Generate the girl as if playing a gacha game. Be descriptive, creative, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Rank: {{getvar::rand}}
Name: Her name
Description: Her desc
Value: How valuable she is
Flavor text: "Her flavor text here"
Image: Describe her appearance using only comma-separated keywords, and must include her clothing, visible features, and facial expression. Example: bright red dress, red hair, twintails, embers, black dragon horns, red eyes, fangs, very angry
1. Her top 1 emoji
2. Her top 2 emoji
3. Her top 3 emoji
``` |
/addvar key=lolicoins -1 |
/max lolicoins 0 | /setvar key=lolicoins |
/trigger

qrList.label: addtolorebook
renderhtmlblank
qrList.message:
/setvar key=blocktrigger true | /run gachalolis.getvals | /if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/echo Loli info incomplete. \| /abort" | /findentry file="Gacha Lolis" {{getvar::name}} | /setvar key=uid | /if left=uid right=0 rule=gte else="/run gachalolis.addtolorebook" "/echo Loli name already exists in lorebook." | /input Input image link | /setvar key=imagelink | /setvar key=html

Rank {{getvar::rank}}

{{getvar::emoji1}}

{{getvar::emoji2}}

{{getvar::emoji3}}

{{getvar::name}}

{{getvar::description}}

Value: {{getvar::value}}

{{getvar::flavortext}}

| /send | /setvar key=htmlready false | /hide {{lastMessageId}} | /echo HTML rendered. Be sure to update her lorebook key. | /flushvar jbout
